item.title: Wordpress to Pelican Blog Migration Complete Date
item.description: This blog is formerly known as "Python Marketer" from 2016 to 2023. In May 2023, I've begun the migration from Wordpress's "Personal" plan to a free, Pythonic Pelican static site. 100 posts are now hosted here exclusively on lofipython.com. I will be posting my projects, Python explorations and technical â€¦
